target.description: Perform the file deployment actions including unzip, copy, and delete.
target.name: fileProcessing

target.description: Perform the operations that must be completed prior to the database being updated.
target.name: preDatabaseUpdate

target.description: Perform the operations that are database dependent.
target.name: databaseUpdate

target.description: Perform the operations that must be completed after the database update has occurred.
target.name: postDatabaseUpdate
